# Valid Markdown File

This file contains only ASCII characters and should pass all checks.

## Features

- Simple bullet points
- No fancy Unicode characters
- Standard ASCII only

## Example Code

```
function hello() {
  console.log("Hello, World!");
}
```

## Directory Structure (ASCII style)

```
+ project/
  + src/
    + main.rs
  + tests/
    + integration.rs
```

This is a valid README file!
